titles.title: CB 106 Therefore They Shall Come and Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THEREFORE THEY SHALL COME AND SING
In the height of Zion and shall flow together to the
goodness of the Lord; for wheat and for wine, for
oil and for the young, for the young of the flock
and of the herd. And their soul shall be as a
watered garden, and they shall not sorrow
anymore at all.
